description: This file is a C header (*.h) file declaring utility functions related to bridge configuration handling for a software module. It contains function prototypes for pre- and post-configuration handling. It includes licensing information and include guards.

methods.name: HandlePreConfigVendorGeneric
methods.description: Function prototype for handling pre-configuration tasks for vendor-specific bridge setup.

methods.name: HandlePostConfigVendorGeneric
methods.description: Function prototype for handling post-configuration tasks for vendor-specific bridge setup.
